statements: SELECT * FROM user_generated_content
SELECT content_id, content, rating FROM user_generated_content WHERE rating > 3
SELECT user_id, comment FROM user_generated_content WHERE user_id = 101
SELECT content, review FROM user_generated_content WHERE content_id IN (1001, 1002, 1003)
SELECT content_id, user_id, rating FROM user_generated_content ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT content, user_id, rating FROM user_generated_content WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY content_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, content, rating FROM user_generated_content WHERE user_id = 101 ORDER BY rating ASC, content_id DESC
SELECT user_id, comment, review FROM user_generated_content WHERE user_id IN (101, 102, 103) AND (comment IS NOT NULL OR review IS NOT NULL) ORDER BY user_id, content_id DESC
SELECT content_id, user_id, review, rating FROM user_generated_content WHERE rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4 AND review LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY rating DESC, content_id ASC
SELECT content_id, user_id, content, comment FROM user_generated_content WHERE user_id = 104 AND (content LIKE '%interesting%' OR comment LIKE '%helpful%') ORDER BY content_id ASC
SELECT * FROM comments;
SELECT content, user_id FROM comments WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT comment_id, created_at FROM comments ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(comment_id) AS total_comments FROM comments GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT rating_id, rating FROM ratings WHERE media_id = 1 ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT comment_id, content FROM comments WHERE comment_id > 100 AND user_id = 3 ORDER BY comment_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(comment_id) AS total_comments FROM comments GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_comments > 5;
SELECT * FROM ratings WHERE rating > 4.5 ORDER BY rating DESC, created_at ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM ratings GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM comments;
SELECT comment_text, user_id FROM comments WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT media_id, comment_text FROM comments WHERE comment_id = 10;
SELECT user_id, comment_text FROM comments WHERE user_id = 3 AND media_id = 7;
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY comment_id DESC
SELECT media_id, comment_text FROM comments WHERE media_id IN (2, 4, 6) ORDER BY media_id
SELECT user_id, review_text, rating FROM reviews WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY review_id ASC
SELECT comment_id, comment_text FROM comments WHERE comment_text LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY comment_id ASC
SELECT media_id, AVG(rating_value) AS avg_rating FROM ratings GROUP BY media_id HAVING avg_rating > 3
SELECT * FROM comments;
SELECT user_id, content, created_at FROM comments WHERE comment_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT review_id, rating FROM reviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM ratings WHERE rated_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT review_id, rating FROM reviews WHERE user_id = 3 AND media_id = 5;
SELECT content FROM comments WHERE comment_id = 10 AND user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, media_id, rating FROM ratings WHERE rating > 4.5 AND rated_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE comment_id = 1;
SELECT comment_text, comment_date, user_id FROM comments WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT rating_value, content_id FROM ratings WHERE user_id = 3 AND rating_value > 3;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, description FROM content WHERE content_id < 10 ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT content_type, title, user_id FROM content WHERE upload_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT comment_text, comment_date FROM comments WHERE user_id = 3 AND comment_date > '2021-06-01' ORDER BY comment_date ASC;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM reviews WHERE user_id <> 2 ORDER BY review_date DESC, rating DESC;
